Bash(python -c "
from tavily_search import TavilySearchTool
from arxiv_search import ArxivSearchTool
from ragflow_kb import RagflowKBTool
from intelligent_project_analyzer.core.types import ToolConfig

# Check each tool
tools = []

# Tavily
try:
    t = TavilySearchTool\(api_key=''test''\)
    has_name = hasattr\(t, ''name''\)
    has_config = hasattr\(t, ''config''\)
    config_name = t.config.name if has_config else ''N/A''
    tools.append\(f''TavilySearchTool: name={has_name}, config={has_config}, config.name={config_name}''\)
except Exception as e:
    tools.append\(f''TavilySearchTool: ERROR - {e}''\)

# Arxiv  
try:
    a = ArxivSearchTool\(\)
    has_name = hasattr\(a, ''name''\)
    has_config = hasattr\(a, ''config''\)
    config_name = a.config.name if has_config else ''N/A''
    tools.append\(f''ArxivSearchTool: name={has_name}, config={has_config}, config.name={config_name}''\)
except Exception as e:
    tools.append\(f''ArxivSearchTool: ERROR - {e}''\)

# Ragflow
try:
    r = RagflowKBTool\(api_endpoint=''test'', api_key=''test'', dataset_id=''test''\)
    has_name = hasattr\(r, ''name''\)
    has_config = hasattr\(r, ''config''\)
    config_name = r.config.name if has_config else ''N/A''
    tools.append\(f''RagflowKBTool: name={has_name}, config={has_config}, config.name={config_name}''\)
except Exception as e:
    tools.append\(f''RagflowKBTool: ERROR - {e}''\)

for t in tools:
    print\(t\)
")
